<b>Topics</b>: Axioms of probability. Redundancy example. Some set theory and De Morgan's laws. Combinatorics.
Partitions. Decision trees. Combinations and permutations.
More combinatorics examples. Conditional probabilities. Independence.
More on conditional probabilities. Review problems.
Worked out exercises on decision trees, birthday problem, allocations. Chain rule.
Law of total probability. Bayes rule. HIV example.
Conditioning: more examples and applications. Bayesian search example.
Discrete uniform and Bernoulli. Conditioning and expectation.
Graphical models. Automated diagnostic example. Simpson paradox.
Properties of expectation. Variance. Gambling problems.
Rare events, accidental deaths,  and the Poisson approximation. Poisson random variables.
Geometric, negative binomial random variables. Hiring/interview problems.
